text: Steve McQueen is the second studio album by British band Prefab Sprout. It was released in June, 1985 through Kitchenware Records and in American it was retitled as Two Wheels Good due the naming conflict with McQueen's estate. It went to number 21 in the United Kingdom, number 178 in the United States, number 33 in New Zealand, number 48 in Australia and number 47 in Canada. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1985 albums Category:Prefab Sprout albums
title: Steve McQueen (album)
